author: Christopher Day
description: Tequila-based, zesty and bitter before turning bittersweet. In March 2022, I cut the volume of gentian liqueur from 15ml (½oz) back to 7.5ml (¼oz) so fans of bitter gentian my want to stick with the original spec.
name: Bending Blades cocktail
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
